title: Effective resumes: resumes for maximum impact
creator_credit: Susan Richardson, Robert Richardson Jr and Riverside Productions
brief_description: This American video addresses the need for every job seeker (in particular young people), to have a resume and methods for laying it out, presentation and content. It presents tips for achieving an edge over other applicants.
creator_credit_for_label: Susan Richardson, Robert Richardson Jr and Riverside Productions
